payment_terms.expectation: Clear draw, repayment, and default interest mechanics.

event_of_default.expectation: Events of default and acceleration rights are explicit.

financial_covenants.expectation: Financial covenants and testing cadence are clearly defined.

collateral_security.expectation: Collateral package and security perfection obligations are specified.

representations_and_warranties.expectation: Borrower representations and warranties are complete and accurate.

conditions_precedent.expectation: Funding and closing conditions precedent are enumerated.

governing_law.expectation: Approved forum and governing law are specified.

policy_rules.description: Credit agreements must define lender remedies and default triggers.
Interest rate and fee mechanics must be expressly defined.
